Task.title: Student Attendance Management Tool
Task.description: A Student Attendance Management Tool is a software application or system designed to facilitate the efficient tracking and management of student attendance in educational institutions. It helps schools, colleges, and universities keep records of students' presence and absence in classes or courses.
